metadata.title: CVE-2023-43279 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Null Pointer Dereference in mask_cidr6 component at cidr.c in Tcpreplay4.4.4 allows attackers to crash the application via crafted tcprewritecommand.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-43279` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tcpreplay - 3.4.4-2+deb8u1ubuntu0.1~esm3
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: tcpreplay package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.4.4-2+deb8u1ubuntu0.1~esm3').
